item.title: Add and remove rules in a Security group
item.description: Adding Rules =begin @author Ryan Tiffany =end require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' client = SoftLayer::Client.new(:timeout => 120) secGroupId = 84301 # Create an object template to create the item. objectTemplate = { 'direction' => 'ingress', 'protocol' => 'tcp', 'portRangeMin' => 22, 'portRangeMax' => 22, 'ethertype' => 'IPv4', 'remoteIp' => '0.0.0.0/0' } newRules = client['SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup'].object_with_id(secGroupId).addRules([objectTemplate]) pp newRules Removing rules =begin @author Ryan Tiffany =end require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' client = SoftLayer::Client.

item.title: Create a Security group
item.description: =begin @author Ryan Tiffany =end require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' client = SoftLayer::Client.new(:timeout => 120) objectTemplate = { 'name' => 'rubyExampleCreation', 'description' => 'Sec Group created via ruby' } createGroup = client['SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup'].createObjects([objectTemplate]) pp createGroup
